text:
All of the *$jsp.java files
           list$jsp.java
           showdetails$jsp.java
           deploy$jsp.java

contain the following error :
if (pageContext != null) pageContext.handlePageException(t);

Jasper cannot compile this and you will get a HTTP500 when attempting to invoke
list,showdetails,deploy thru admin interface

the fix is:
if (pageContext != null) pageContext.handlePageException((Exception)t);

Martin Gainty
31 Aug 2002
creator: mgainty@hotmail.com
medthomas@ntlworld.com
text:
I have checked this with the HEAD of tomcat 4.1 and the HEAD of tomcat 5. The 
admin application compiles successfully in both cases without the proposed 
patch.
